page.text: This parameter sets the background color of the generated code image.

list.item: Description: Defines the background color using either a hexadecimal value or an RGBA format.

page.text: Use this parameter to customize the background color of the generated image. It supports formats like HEX (e.g., #FFFFFF) and RGBA (e.g., rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)).
